body_text:
The Nothing Burger Experiment is the first preference experiment we are going to run. It is going to change an inconsequential preference, and make sure that the data collection pipeline is working. Preference experiments have landed in mozilla-central, and should be available on Firefox 55 Nightly soon.
The things we need to do for the experiment are:

 Verify that version 51 of shield-recipe-client is available in Nightly

Expected to be in  Nightly 2017-05-04


 Pick a preference to run the experiment on: test.normandy.prefflip.defaultpref
 Pick the branches and values for the preference

control:  0, weight: 3
versionA: 1, weight, 2
versionB: 2, weight, 1


 Write a filter expression that targets nightly and a small sample rate
 Set up analysis on telemetry to catch the experiment data
 Make a recipe targeting incorporating the above
 Wait
 Gather data
body_html:
The Nothing Burger Experiment is the first preference experiment we are going to run. It is going to change an inconsequential preference, and make sure that the data collection pipeline is working. Preference experiments have landed in mozilla-central, and should be available on Firefox 55 Nightly soon.

The things we need to do for the experiment are:

  • Verify that version 51 of shield-recipe-client is available in Nightly
    • Expected to be in Nightly 2017-05-04
  • Pick a preference to run the experiment on: test.normandy.prefflip.defaultpref
  • Pick the branches and values for the preference
    • control: 0, weight: 3
    • versionA: 1, weight, 2
    • versionB: 2, weight, 1
  • Write a filter expression that targets nightly and a small sample rate
  • Set up analysis on telemetry to catch the experiment data
  • Make a recipe targeting incorporating the above
  • Wait
  • Gather data
title: Nothing Burger Experiment
body:
The Nothing Burger Experiment is the first preference experiment we are going to run. It is going to change an inconsequential preference, and make sure that the data collection pipeline is working. Preference experiments have landed in mozilla-central, and should be available on Firefox 55 Nightly soon.

The things we need to do for the experiment are:

* [x] Verify that version 51 of shield-recipe-client is available in Nightly
  * Expected to be in  Nightly 2017-05-04
* [x] Pick a preference to run the experiment on: test.normandy.prefflip.defaultpref
* [x] Pick the branches and values for the preference
  - control:  0, weight: 3
  - versionA: 1, weight, 2
  - versionB: 2, weight, 1
* [x] Write a filter expression that targets nightly and a small sample rate
* [ ] Set up analysis on telemetry to catch the experiment data
* [x] Make a recipe targeting incorporating the above
* [ ] Wait
* [ ] Gather data
